title: Jeff Hanneman
summary: Jeffrey John Hanneman (January 31, 1964 â€“ May 2, 2013) was an American musician, best known as a founding member and lead guitarist of the American thrash metal band Slayer. Hanneman composed both music and lyrics for every Slayer album until his death in 2013 at age 49. He had his own signature guitar, the ESP Jeff Hanneman Signature model.
